IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_event_log GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_event_log @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT g.id, g.log_type, g.player1_id, ISNULL(c1.nickname, N''), g.player2_id, ISNULL(c2.nickname, N''), g.param1, g.log_at FROM dbo.Guild_Event_Logs AS g LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c1 ON g.player1_id = c1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Characters AS c2 ON g.player2_id = c2.id WHERE g.guild_id = @guild_id ORDER BY g.log_at ASC
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_guild_event_log') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_guild_event_log GO
